boat.construction_details: Epoxy-glued clinker marine plywood on laminated wood frames

for_sales.sales_text:
Spirit Of Wenda is a splendid example of the Albert Strange Wenda design. She is a serious contender for anyone considering a classic yacht.

For sale due to the sad death of her builder/ owner Claudio Frontero, she comes complete with new unused sails.

Sails: Tan, Clipper cloth by North Sea Sails, UK. Jib set on roller-furling gear
Engine: Honda 4T outboard - 2.3 hp (long shaft)
Accessories: depth sounder + safety equipment

Viewable at: Port of Cisano in Bardolino (on Lake Garda) VERONA -ITALY

boat.full_description: Built by Claudio Frontero. an experienced, meticulous and methodicl amateur boatbuilder who was taken ill not long after the boat was first launched in 2019, and she is virtually unused.
boat.home_port: Port of Cisano in Bardolino (on Lake Garda) VERONA
boat.name: Spirit of Wenda
